    • Field Detail

      • patchReady

        public static boolean patchReady

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectionManager

        public ConnectionManager(Shard_Core shard_core)

    • Method Detail

      • startConnectionThread

        public void startConnectionThread()
        Start the Shards connection thread to connect to the Heart server. Tries to connect every 10 seconds. If the connection is already active, nothing happens. Used to automatically reconnect to the Heart on disconnect.

      • startShardClient

        public void startShardClient()
                      throws ClientInitializationException
        Used to start the Shard, create connection to it's Heart and initialize the running thread.
        Throws:
        ClientInitializationException - thrown if there is an error creating the Client. Error details will be in the getMessage()

      • connectToMediaServer

        public void connectToMediaServer(int mediaServerPort,
                                 java.lang.String mediaType)

      • startShardClientSuppressed

        @Deprecated
public void startShardClientSuppressed()
        Deprecated. 

      • stopShardClient

        public void stopShardClient()
                     throws Netta.Exceptions.ConnectionException
        Used to stop the Shard nicely. Sends a close connection packet to the Heart to terminate connection, which will then terminate IO streams
        Throws:
        Netta.Exceptions.ConnectionException - thrown when there is an issue closing the IO streams to the Heart. Error will be in the getMessage()

      • initPatcher

        public void initPatcher()
        Patcher helper method. Initializes the Patcher class, checks if there is an update to the Shard. GUI Elements will not be available until this method is finished.

        Called after clientThread is started

      • swapID

        public void swapID()
            throws Netta.Exceptions.SendPacketException
        Exchange ID information with the Heart
        Throws:
        Netta.Exceptions.SendPacketException - thrown if there is an issue sending packets to Heart. Details will be in getMessage()

      • resetConnectionData

        public void resetConnectionData()
        Used to stop the Shard without warning. Does the same thing as stopShardClient() without sending a packet to the Heart

      • stopShardConnectionThread

        public void stopShardConnectionThread()
        Stop the Shard from continuously trying to connect to the Heart

      • sendPacket

        public void sendPacket(Netta.Connection.Packet p,
                       boolean encrypted)
                throws Netta.Exceptions.SendPacketException
        Send a packet to the Heart
        Parameters:
        p - Packet to send
        encrypted - boolean True to encrypt packet, else false
        Throws:
        Netta.Exceptions.SendPacketException - thrown if there is an error sending the Packet to the Heart. Error will be in the getMessage()

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Check whether the Shards connection to the Heart is active or not
        Returns:
        boolean whether the connection is active

      • getPort

        public int getPort()
        get the Port being connected to by the Shard
        Returns:
        int Port being connected to

      • getIP

        public java.lang.String getIP()
        get the IP address being connected to by the Shard
        Returns:
        String IP address being connected to

      • getPatcher

        public ShardPatcher getPatcher()

      • getClient

        public Client getClient()
